Title: Establishes a working group to create a pilot program for an alternative system to a credit score
Summary: Establishes a working group to create a pilot program for an alternative system to a credit score for unbanked persons, undocumented immigrants and any other individuals who would benefit from such alternative system.
LawCode: Add ยง312, Fin Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the financial services law, in relation to establishing a working group to create a pilot program for an alternative system to a credit score
